name: search1api-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides search and crawl functionality using Search1API

scripts.build:
tsc && node -e "require('fs').chmodSync('build/index.js', '755')" && node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('.env.example')) { require('fs').writeFileSync('.env.example', '# Search1API Configuration
# Get your API key from https://www.search1api.com/?utm_source=mcp
SEARCH1API_KEY=your_api_key_here
') }"

author: fatwang2
